name: Spongebob Squarepants - Arcade 8bit Platformer
description:
Spongebob Squarepants 2023 R.S.

=========================================

 Spongebob Squarepants is a retro 8bit Arcade style platformer with 4 Worlds with many obstacles to overcome!

=========================================

     

                             INSTRUCTIONS

In Spongebob Squarepants, you play as Spongebob and run, jump, bounce on clouds and bop on enemies! Spongebob has to face some People along his journey!

Left and Right Arrow Keys to move

Up Arrow Key to Jump

Space to Shoot

=========================================

                                       STORY

Plankton has stole the Krabby Patty secret formula, and Mr. Krabs sends Spongebob to get the formula back! And he has go to many different places to find it and Plankton!

=========================================

Players [1]
